definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
sentences.chinese: 宥恕不能變更疇前，但能拓寬他。

sentences.english: She will be a guest performer at the concert, sharing a duet with Lin.
sentences.chinese: 她會是演唱會嘉賓，跟林宥嘉對唱一首歌曲。

sentences.english: Zilu and others surprised, they looked toward Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 孔丘與子路等人看，宥坐垂直。

sentences.english: I do pleadvertising your pardon for the mistake I've madvertisinge.
sentences.chinese: 請您必定宥恕我所犯的錯誤。

sentences.english: Finally, the teacher has to sit out a cosmopolitan device.
sentences.chinese: 最後，老師又取出一個宥坐器。

sentences.english: He is a tall man with glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個宥配戴眼睛高大的人。

sentences.english: Confucius, Zilu and others watch and the stool becomes upright.
sentences.chinese: 孔丘與子路等人看，宥坐垂直。

sentences.english: The lenient stool tilts, and Yan Hui pours water in.
sentences.chinese: 宥坐傾斜的樣子，顏回倒水。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the lowest point in life time, yu li returned to his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 所幸在人生最低潮的時刻，宥莉回到了自己的故鄉。

sentences.english: Do any ability follow diet excusing nutrition ?
sentences.chinese: 日常飲食任何才能跟宥營養？

definition: (archaic) to give birth to a child/to rear
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
